title:u/pandapaxxy's Season Pass / Dawning M+KB breakdown
description:Originally found at https://old.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazbrp/season_pass_dawning_mnk_breakdown/

// Cold Front (curated / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (curated / M+KB): "Vorpal Weapon and Osmosis are also shaping up to be really strong this season. You will definitely want a larger magazine as I find 27 to be far too little."
dimwishlist:item=1506719573&perks=3250034553,3230963543,2387244414,1774574192
